name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Majestic Uptime Mech Overlord Zero Suit RX-0

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Majestic Uptime Mech Overlord Zero Suit RX-0 will help you monitor your websites--beep, boop.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Majestic Uptime Mech Overlord Zero Suit RX-0 will help you monitor your websites via the Uptime Robot service. View all your monitors at once, set check intervals, and get browser notifications when your sites are down--beep, boop, beep!

This extension requires an Uptime Robot account at https://uptimerobot.com/
